stringConfig.guildAdd:
Hey, %@! Thanks for adding me to your server **%@**!
> To get started, run the command `/%@` in your server!
stringConfig.dmReceived:
Thanks for the DM! Your complaint/issue/feedback has been logged!

*Note: If you're sending an image, make sure you include the link!*
stringConfig.noPermission: You don't have permission to use this command.
stringConfig.noSetup: To use this command, an admin must first do /boar-manage setup!
stringConfig.doingSetup: BoarBot is currently being set up! Please wait!
stringConfig.noGuild: This can only be used in a server!
stringConfig.onCooldown: You're using this command too fast! Please wait 5 seconds!
stringConfig.noAttachmentPerms: BoarBot doesn't have attachment permissions, so some interactive images may not appear.
stringConfig.error: Something went wrong! Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, DM BoarBot with the issue!
stringConfig.maintenance: BoarBot is currently in maintenance mode!
stringConfig.setupError: An error occurred while getting information! Try again later.
stringConfig.setupFinishedAll: BoarBot has successfully been set up! Do /boar daily in one of the boar channels you chose to get started.
stringConfig.setupExpired: You haven't interacted with the form for 2 minutes! Automatically terminating setup.
stringConfig.setupUnfinished1:
**What channel can be used for trading?** 
*(Note: Threads will dynamically be created in this channel.)*
stringConfig.setupUnfinished2:
**What channels can BoarBot commands be used in? [Max 3]** 
*(Note: If you have a lot of server members, these channels may get flooded.)*
stringConfig.setupUnfinished3: **Is this server a Hypixel SkyBlock community?**
stringConfig.setupFinished1: **The channel you're using for trading is: **
stringConfig.setupFinished2: **These are the channels you've selected for BoarBot to work in: **
stringConfig.setupInfoResponse1: This bot has a trading system! In order for the trading system to work properly, it needs its own channel. Threads will dynamically be created and deleted in this channel unless the bot doesn't have permission to do so. If this is the case, trading will unfortunately be automatically disabled. This channel can be changed at any time using /boar-manage setup. Use the pencil button to enter a channel ID (right-click channel name, Copy ID) that isn't shown in the select box.
stringConfig.setupInfoResponse2: This bot has slash commands and can produce spammy content depending on how large your server is. This is why you'll need to decide which channel(s) the bot is enabled in. These channels can be changed at any time using /boar-manage setup. You can also use the pencil button to enter a channel ID (right-click the channel name and click 'Copy ID') of a channel that isn't shown in the selection box.
stringConfig.setupInfoResponse3: This bot originated on a Discord server dedicated to Hypixel SkyBlock. If you don't know what that is, no sweat! Just click "No". If you do and you're part of the community, it's highly recommended that you click "Yes". This can be changed at any time using /boar-manage setup.
stringConfig.dailyUsed: You've already used your daily boar! The next time you can use the command is in %@.
stringConfig.dailyUsedNotify: You've already used your daily boar! The next time you can use the command is in %@. Click the button below to be notified!
stringConfig.dailyNoBoarFound: Failed to find one or more valid boars!
stringConfig.giveBoar: Successfully given boar (If it didn't show, make sure perms are correct!)
stringConfig.giveBadID: ID input is not valid. To see valid IDs, wait for choices to appear.
stringConfig.giveBadge: Successfully given badge (If it didn't show, make sure perms are correct!)
stringConfig.giveBadgeHas: This user already has this badge!
stringConfig.collEnhanceDetails: This action will take your %@ and convert it into a random boar of the next rarity. The result of this interaction is shown above. Click "Enhance" again to confirm.
stringConfig.collGiftDetails: has sent out a %@! Be the first to click "Open" to claim it! (Both giver and opener get rewards)
stringConfig.giftFail: BoarBot is missing permissions needed to send gifts!
stringConfig.powRightFull: %@ It took you %@ms to guess correctly! Wait for the powerup to end to see your placement.
stringConfig.powTopOneResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you in the Top 1%! You received %@!
stringConfig.powTopTenResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you in the Top 10%! You received %@!
stringConfig.powTopFiftyResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you in the Top 50%! You received %@!
stringConfig.powNoRewardResponse: You had a time of %@ms, putting you outside any bracket that gives rewards. Better luck next time!
stringConfig.notInBoard: The user you entered isn't on this leaderboard! Defaulting to first page.
stringConfig.marketConfirmInstaBuy: Are you sure? You're buying %@, bringing the total cost to $%@. Click 'Buy Now' to confirm your purchase.
stringConfig.marketUpdatedInstaBuy: The market prices have fluctuated! Your new total cost is $%@. If you're fine with this, click 'Buy Now' to confirm your purchase.
stringConfig.marketConfirmInstaSell: Are you sure? You're selling %@, bringing the total return to $%@. Click 'Sell Now' to confirm your sale.
stringConfig.marketUpdatedInstaSell: The market prices have fluctuated! Your new total return is $%@. If you're fine with this, click 'Sell Now' to confirm your sale.
stringConfig.marketInstaComplete: Transaction complete! All boar bucks/items have been received.
stringConfig.marketConfirmBuyOrder: Are you sure? You're setting up a buy order for %@, bringing the total potential cost to $%@. Click 'Buy Order' again to confirm your order.
stringConfig.marketConfirmSellOrder: Are you sure? You're setting up a sell offer for %@, bringing the total potential return to $%@. Click 'Sell Offer' again to confirm your offer.
stringConfig.marketOrderComplete: Order/Offer placed! To see the status of your order, click 'Orders'.
stringConfig.marketConfirmUpdateIncrease: Are you sure? Your order/offer for %@ will increase in price from $%@ to $%@.
stringConfig.marketConfirmUpdateDecrease: Are you sure? Your order/offer for %@ will decrease in price from $%@ to $%@.
stringConfig.marketMaxItems: You've reached the maximum amount of this item in your collection!
stringConfig.marketNoRoom: Your collection can't fit this amount of items!
stringConfig.marketMustClaim: You have items/bucks to claim! Claim them first!
stringConfig.marketNoBucks: You don't have enough boar bucks for this!
stringConfig.marketNoEdition: You don't have this edition so you cannot sell it!
stringConfig.marketNoEditionOrders: Not enough orders of this item edition to complete this transaction!
stringConfig.marketNoItems: You don't have enough of this item!
stringConfig.marketNoOrders: Not enough orders of this item to complete this transaction!
stringConfig.marketMaxOrders: You reached the maximum number of orders you can place! Cancel or claim one of your orders to create a new one!
stringConfig.marketInvalid: Invalid input! Input(s) must be a positive integer!
stringConfig.marketWrongEdition: The edition you input didn't match the edition you're trying to buy/sell!
stringConfig.marketTooMany: You may only set up an order for 1000 items or less at a time!
stringConfig.marketTooHigh: Order price must be $%@ or lower!
stringConfig.marketEditionHigh: That edition of this item doesn't exist!
stringConfig.marketHasEdition: You already have that edition of this item or are currently selling it!
stringConfig.marketTooYoung: Your Discord account is too young to use Boar Market!
stringConfig.marketTooCheap: The price you entered is too low! Must be at least $%@.
stringConfig.marketTooExpensive: The price you entered is too high! Must be at maximum $%@.
stringConfig.notificationSuccess: You've successfully enabled notifications! You'll be notified when your daily boar is available.
stringConfig.notificationSuccessReply: Success! You should've received a DM from BoarBot.
stringConfig.notificationStopStr: ||Message me STOP to turn off notifications||
notificationExtras: Maybe this time you'll get a divine!
Did you know that boars are nocturnal?
Did you know that you can enhance a Divine boar?
Want to suggest a feature or report a bug? Message me and it'll report back to the developers!
There are %@ unique boars to collect!
Boar Gifts have a chance of giving a super rare item...
Did you know that boars can jump up to five feet?
Did you know that boar hairs used to be used for toothbrush bristles?
Did you know that there are over 9 million wild boars?
Boar game will *never* be pay to win!
BoarBot will never ask for your personal information.
Did you know that a group of boar is called a sounder?
Did you know that powerups spawn every 1.5-2.5 hours?
You have a boar streak of %@!
stringConfig.notValidChannel: This channel isn't valid! Try a different one! The channel should be a text channel, be not already chosen, and exists in this server.

boar.name: boar
boar.description: Commands to play and interact with BoarBot

args.name: area
args.description: The area you may need help with

args.name: page
args.description: The page to start out on

collection.name: collection
collection.description: View someone's collection of boars, badges, and powerups

args.name: user
args.description: Check someone else's collection of boars

args.description: What view to start off in (Normal, Detailed, Powerups)

args.description: Page to start off on. Accepts boar names.

modals.title: Input Page Number or Boar Name

top.name: top
top.description: View leaderboards showcasing a ranking of player stats

args.description: The user to find on the leaderboard

args.name: page
args.description: The page to start out on

args.name: view
args.description: What view to start off in (Overview, Buy/Sell, Your Orders)

args.name: page
args.description: The page to start out on

modals.title: Input Page Number or Boar/Item Name

setup.name: setup
setup.description: Set BoarBot up to your liking

boarDev.name: boar-dev
boarDev.description: Commands exclusive to developers of BoarBot

args.name: user
args.description: User you'd like to give the item to

emojiFind.name: Emoji Find
emojiFind.description: Click the emoji that's different from the others!

tiny1.name: Tiny Boar
tiny1.description: What boar is mentioned in Tiny Boar's description?

explosionless1.name: Explosionless Boar
explosionless1.description: What adjective describes Explosionless Boar's potential explosivity?

chocolate1.name: Chocolate Boar
chocolate1.description: What year was Chocolate Boar pulled off shelves?

matrix1.name: Matrix Boar
matrix1.description: What color pill does Matrix Boar keep taking?

fast.name: Quick Click
fast.description: Be the first to click the green button!

explosionless.name: Explosionless Boar
explosionless.description: Its mind was blown so hard that it refuses to ignite anymore. If it ever does, though, the assumption is that the resulting explosion would be... cataclysmic.

tiny.name: Tiny Boar
tiny.description: The result of failed experiment done by Wizard Boar. Has come to terms with its condition by living with ants.

bor.name: bor
bor.description: While most boars evolve over time, this one seems to have decided that devolving was a better idea.

lowquality.name: Low Quality Boar
lowquality.description: Like Normal Boar but with an internet speed of 1 Kb/s. The other boars find interacting with this boar to be difficult.

carrot.name: Carrot Boar
carrot.description: On the surface, it's indistinguishable from the grass around it. The only being capable of spotting them is Farmer Boar.

buff.name: Buff Boar
buff.description: It's said this boar can crush rocks with its bare hands. Stuck in a toxic relationship with Coffee Boar simply for appearances.

chocolate.name: Chocolate Boar
chocolate.description: A discontinued chocolate bar from 1999. It was pulled off the shelves after traces of boar meat were discovered inside it.

emo.name: Emo Boar
emo.description: Is said to be so emotional and sensitive that it can feel the emotions of those around them. Mostly keeps to itself.

matrix.name: Matrix Boar
matrix.description: Keeps taking Acetaminophen because of its red color. Believes that its destiny is to save humanity from the AI overlords.

soda.name: Soda Boar
soda.description: After much engineering and toil, scientists created this boar, which replaces its signature explosion with a constant stream of soda.

lightbulb.name: Lightboarb
lightbulb.description: This boar is the only thing that scares off Creepy Boar. It's a staple of any household.

minion.name: Minion Boar
minion.description: The best money making minion on BoarBlock. Slap an enchanted hopper on this boar and you'll make millions.

sketch.name: Sketch Boar
sketch.description: This boar was created by Boartist. It's impossible to erase. DO NOT leave it by a printer.

ghost.name: Ghost Boar
ghost.description: Its love for karaoke combined with its terrible singing skills results in a terrifying experience.

pumpkin.name: Pumpkin Boar
pumpkin.description: The only immortal boar. If it's destroyed, it grows back from the same plant it came from in less than a day.

spider.name: Spider Boar
spider.description: Forced a spider to bite it for superpowers. Instead, it just turned into a spider. Much less cool and far more gross.

vampire.name: Count Boarcula
vampire.description: This boar is addicted to sucking the blood from other boars. Legend has it that it sucked the blood from 117 boars in one night.

zombie.name: Zomboar
zombie.description: Zombification is impossible for boars, so this boar is actually just a cannibal in a costume. Still frightening either way.

clown.name: Clown Boar
clown.description: It is said that this boar was directly modeled after someone who posted cringe on the internet.

sphere.name: Sphere Boar
sphere.description: After many millennia of the concretion process, this boar took the form of a perfect sphere. What's at its core? Nobody knows.

killer.name: Killer Boar
killer.description: Has a thirst for killing that must be sated every night. If it isn't, chaos is bound to ensue.

fish.name: Boarfish
fish.description: A highly invasive fish-boar amalgamation. It has a friendly personality around humans but displays vicious predatory instincts for other fish in its environment.

kiwi.name: Kiwi Boar
kiwi.description: This boar is part of a cult with shape-shifting abilities. Instead of doing anything cool, though, they remain as a kiwi fruit.

stormy.name: Stormy Boar
stormy.description: Cursed by Creator Boar for something unspeakable, this boar has a constant rain cloud pouring down around it. Lightning also smites it at random intervals.

golden.name: Golden Boar
golden.description: This boar was recovered from an abandoned mine that once belonged to a legendary dwarf. Since it's 100% pure gold, jewelers use it as a standard for gold quality.

keyboard.name: KeyBOARd
keyboard.description: A mind controlling boar-keyboard hybrid. It's highly rated on Boarmazon, but only because it forces its users to write good reviews.

pirate.name: Pirate Boar
pirate.description: This boar has been on the hunt for the elusive Treasure Boar for 50 years. Maybe you can help Pirate Boar on this hunt in the future...

creepy.name: Creepy Boar
creepy.description: While it may look strikingly similar to a normal boar at first glance, it's actually a paranormal being that lives inside the skin of recently deceased boars.

robot.name: RoboBoar-9000
robot.description: A sentient robot capable of overthrowing the human race that simply decides not to. Matrix Boar is convinced they're up to something nefarious, but can't seem to prove it.

coffee.name: Coffee Boar
coffee.description: Rarely seen not drinking coffee. Can typically be found getting her nails done or posting a selfie of herself on social media.

moon.name: Moon Boar
moon.description: This boar is actually just the other side of the Moon that we can't see. NASA spends billions every year to keep the secret from getting out.

wizard.name: Wizard Boar
wizard.description: Cheated its way to an Honors Boarwarts diploma. It now performs street magic to pay its bills, as it never learned how to actually cast spells.

aurora.name: Aurora Boarealis
aurora.description: People travel across the world to see its beauty. Only appears when Moon Boar is eclipsing the sun.

kuudra.name: Kuudra Boar
kuudra.description: Part lava. Part boar. Part kraken. The more sulphur this boar consumes, the more powerful it gets.

mlg.name: MLG Boar
mlg.description: Lives in its mom's basement and believes it's the best gamer of all time. Reeks of diarrhea and stale chips.

minimumwage.name: Minimum Wage Boar
minimumwage.description: One of the smartest boars in the universe. Nobody's quite sure why it works at a fast food restaurant, but there must be a reason.

backrooms.name: Backrooms Boar
backrooms.description: This boar fell into the backrooms while recording a skateboarding montage with its friends. Neither it nor the walls around it seem to age.

jumpscare.name: Jumpscare Boar
jumpscare.description: Shoves its face into peoples' doorbell cameras to make them think it's a Creepy Boar. Creepy Boars abuse this to find new victims.

sleepy.name: Sleepy Boar
sleepy.description: Whatever this boar dreams of comes true the following day. Is kept in a lab to ensure it doesn't dream of the Boarpocalypse.

boartist.name: Boartist
boartist.description: An incredibly talented painter that's capable of bringing its creations to life. It's kept in the same lab as Sleepy Boar.

grimreaper.name: Grim Reboar
grimreaper.description: This boar does the bidding of Creator Boar, executing boars that don't fit its plan. Also a big fan of chess when it's off duty.

newborn.name: Newboarn
newborn.description: This boar uses its adorable looks to lure unsuspecting families into caring for it. It hides away before it grows up, so nobody knows what it turns into.

volcano.name: Volcano Boar
volcano.description: Explosionless Boar becomes this boar when it finally explodes. Under the right circumstances, the ashes it spews out can create a Grim Reboar.

cowboy.name: Cowboar
cowboy.description: This boar has unparalleled skill when it comes to lassoing and piloting horses. It also refuses to touch any modern technology.

realistic.name: Realistic Boar
realistic.description: A taxidermy of a boar that came before the rise of Creator Boar. After much debate, it was modified to match the look of Normal Boar.

farmer.name: Farmer Boar
farmer.description: Harvests Carrot Boars to sell to Cowboar. Lives a mundane yet comforting life with its wife and kids.

beachbum.name: Beach Bum Boar
beachbum.description: Buys and sells Golden Boars to fund its ongoing vacation in the Boarhamas. Its skin is leathery from how much sun it gets.

hyperion.name: Boarperion
hyperion.description: A highly sought after weapon from BoarBlock. Used to kill the toughest of bosses and largest of armies.

fairy.name: Fairy Boar
fairy.description: This boar exists on a separate plane that's only accessible through eating Boarshrooms. If you're lucky, it might grant you a wish.

unicorn.name: Uniboarn
unicorn.description: Exists in the same plane as Fairy Boar. Not only is it one of the most elegant boars, its horn can also perform magical spells.

rickroll.name: Rickroll Boar
rickroll.description: Spreads the word of Creator Boar. He'll never give you up, nor will he let you down. He certainly won't run around and... desert you.

morbius.name: Boarbius
morbius.description: A boar whose sense of humor is exclusive to April and May of 2022. Thinks Morbius is the greatest movie of all time.

imposter.name: Imposter Boar
imposter.description: Kills its crewmates on the International Boar Station and frames it as a spacewalking accident. Its kill count is said to be in the dozens.

curious.name: Curious Boarge
curious.description: With the extinction of all apes, a new mascot for the classic children's book was needed to appeal to modern society.

dante.name: Boarnte
dante.description: This boar has been keeping BoarBlock great since Year 128. The revolt against him failed and he now aims his ambitions to the newly opened rift...

pixel.name: Pixel Boar
pixel.description: This is the only sprite-work that was recovered from a 1985 game called Super Boar Bros. The rest was lost when Boartendo went bankrupt.

supernova.name: Suboarnova
supernova.description: Some stars explode into this boar after they die out instead of a regular supernova. It's become a highly researched area of Boarstronomy.

creator.name: Creator Boar
creator.description: Guides the creation of all boars in the universe. While it may seem like a divine being, it's actually just an albino boar hell-bent on creating an artificial boar species.

gigachad.name: GigaChad Boar
gigachad.description: Flawless. Enjoyer of things. Incredibly based. This boar is always at Creator Boar's side to immediately invalidate opposing opinions.

gamebreaker.name: Gameboarker
gamebreaker.description: The only thing on its mind is destruction. Its cells are infused with gunpowder, resulting in bigger and more powerful explosions.

bacteria.name: Boarcterium
bacteria.description: The first boar ever created by Creator Boar. Catching a cold from this boar results in explosive symptoms.

underwear.name: Boarnderwear
underwear.description: Children all around the world are disappointed when they open a gift excitedly just to get this boar. It appears as though it's been worn.

spooky.name: Spooky Boar
spooky.description: The suspicious host of Boar-o-ween. He can't go a sentence without rhyming and always seems to have traces of pig hair on his coat.

trophy.name: Trophy Boar
trophy.description: The arch rival of Golden Boar, outshining it in every aspect of life. It's hard not to stare at this boar in awe.

early_supporter.name: Early Subboarter
early_supporter.description: Given to users that helped support the bot in Alpha

hunter.name: Boar Hunter
hunter.description: Given to users that have collected all non-Special boars

artist.name: Boartist
artist.description: Given to users that made a boar that made it into the game

athlete.name: Boarthlete
athlete.description: Given to users that are currently #1 on a leaderboard

catnod.name: Catnod
catnod.description: Given to users that helped support the bot in Alpha

multiBoost.name: Multiplier Boost
multiBoost.description: Boosts your multiplier by adding to its current value, making it more likely to get rarer boars when you do /boar daily.

gift.name: Boar Gift
gift.description: A gift that you can be sent to and opened by other people. Contains boar bucks, boars, rare surprises, and more.

extraChance.name: Extra Boar Chance
extraChance.description: Increases your chance of getting an extra boar when you do /boar daily. Capped at 300%. Multiplier boosts apply to all extra boars.

enhancer.name: Boar Enhancer
enhancer.description: Can be used to enhance a boar to a random boar of the next rarity. Capped at 16. Divine is the maximum rarity that can be enhanced.
